title: Numeral Sales Tax Reviews | Their Words, Not Ours
description: Growing ecommerce and SaaS businesses trust Numeral for rates, remittance, and everything in between.

data.html:
Numeral puts sales tax on autopilot.

Spend less than 5 minutes per month on sales tax.

Our white-glove service helps our customers get compliant, stay compliant, and focus on growing their business.

Numeral reviews sourced by G2

data.html:
Founders, CFOs, & brands love Numeral

Read story

Numeral tailors its solution to each client’s needs. Everything is customized. And I loved that I could talk to sales tax experts. Numeral guarantees no compliance mistakes will happen. Nobody else was willing to make that promise.

Jason Wong
Founder, Doe Lashes
Read story

We had many issues with TaxJar, including incorrect tax filings that resulted in an overpayment of $5,700 and non-existent customer support. Numeral provided complete onboarding, prompt customer service, and rapid feature additions based on customer input.

Kevin Chanthasiriphan
Founder, immi
Read story

I was spending way too many hours every month on sales tax. Numeral has made it easy to identify and know the tax laws. And then, on your behalf, registering and managing everything takes the worry off my plate.

Jesse Hiss
Founder, Fresh Sends
Read story

It's set it and forget it. At the end of the day, I'd much rather spend time growing our business than worrying about sales tax. We love Numeral. I don't know how you squeeze a number out of it, but I'd give working with them a 10 out of 10.

Adrian Zhang
Co-founder, The Woobles
Read story

Numeral worked with us to figure out where we stood at the time and where we should be. They ensured that we were a compliant business and doing everything correctly. It's set it and forget it.

Tom Phillips
Co-founder, Bro Glo

Read story

Numeral tailors its solution to each client’s needs. Everything is customized. And I loved that I could talk to sales tax experts. Numeral guarantees no compliance mistakes will happen. Nobody else was willing to make that promise.

Jason Wong
Founder, Doe Lashes
Read story

We had many issues with TaxJar, including incorrect tax filings that resulted in an overpayment of $5,700 and non-existent customer support. Numeral provided complete onboarding, prompt customer service, and rapid feature additions based on customer input.

Kevin Chanthasiriphan
Founder, immi

I was spending way too many hours every month on sales tax. Numeral has made it easy to identify and know the tax laws. And then, on your behalf, registering and managing everything takes the worry off my plate.

Founder, Fresh Sends

It's set it and forget it. At the end of the day, I'd much rather spend time growing our business than worrying about sales tax. We love Numeral. I don't know how you squeeze a number out of it, but I'd give working with them a 10 out of 10.

<style>

.v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
  border-radius: 0.75rem;
  background:  var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  height: 2.875rem;
  padding: .1875rem;
  position: relative;
}

.v3_footer .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: none;
  background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 65%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field .input {
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field > label {
  display: none;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 140%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  field-sizing: content;
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input::selection {
  background: black;
}

.v3_footer-cta .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msgs {
  position: absolute;
  background: #ff3100cf;
  top: 3rem;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  width: max-content;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  list-style: none;
  border-radius: 0.5rem;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  grid-row-gap: 0.25rem;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msg {
  background: transparent;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 0.825rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 0;
  border: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  position: absolute;
  top: 150%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-700);
  height: 100%;
  border-radius: .5rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10), 0px 1px 2px -1px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10);
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:hover {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-800);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:active {
  box-shadow: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit .actions {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit input {
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  white-space: nowrap;
  width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill,
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:hover, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:focus, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:active {
  transition: background-color 5000s;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: var(--white) !important;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  display: none !important;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

	.v3_email-collect-form-embed {
    width: 100%;
  }
  
 .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  	border: none;
  	background: transparent;
	}
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
    flex-direction: column;
    grid-row-gap: 0.75rem;
    height: max-content;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field, .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
    width: 100%;
    height: 2.75rem;
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
    max-width: 100%;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
    height: 2.75rem;
    width: 100%;
  }

}


</style>

<script>
  hbspt.forms.create({
    portalId: "39949294",
    formId: "7c6aefad-be41-466e-9cdb-38a4d3786439",
		onFormReady: function () {
      // Remove asterisk from placeholder:
      $('input[name="email"]').attr("placeholder", "Enter your work email");

			// April 1st changes:
			const pageSlug = document.querySelector('html').getAttribute('data-wf-item-slug');
      if(pageSlug == 'global') {
      	document.cookie = "enteringPage=global; path=/";
      }
    }
  });
</script>
